    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Admin
    Represents an admin in the system.
    App
    The main application class that tests the database connection.
    Buyer
    Represents a buyer in the system.
    ConcreteUser
     
    DatabaseConnection
    Provides a connection to the database.
    Menu
    Provides the console-based user interface for interacting with the application.
    Product
    Represents a product in the store.
    ProductDAO
    Data Access Object for product-related database operations.
    ProductService
    Handles product-related operations such as adding, updating, and deleting products.
    Seller
    Represents a seller in the system.
    User
    Represents a generic user in the system.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object for user-related database operations.
    UserService
    Handles user-related operations such as registration, authentication, and user management.
